IAzureKinect

Base interface shared across all image types

Header

#include "Cameras/AzureKinect/IAzureKinect.h"

Functions
CreateAzureKinect
CRefObj<IAzureKinect> CreateAzureKinect(
int deviceId,
ColorMode colorMode,
DepthMode depthMode,
FPSMode fpsMode,
bool captureBodies = false
)

Creates a new instance of the Azure Kinect.

Parameters
deviceId
int

index of device to use

colorMode
ColorMode

color mode for the device

depthMode
DepthMode

depth mode for the device

fpsMode
FPSMode

frames per second mode

captureBodies
bool

should skeleton tracking be used

Returns

Returns the newly created camera

#include "Cameras/AzureKinect/IAzureKinect.h"
